name.baseName: Dry fried meat products ; Raw material meat ; Pickling + dry frying ; All sizes; NESPS2
干炸肉制品 ; 原料肉 ; 腌制+干炸 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了包括腌制和干炸在内的干炸肉制品的制造过程数据，适用于所有规模的生产。它适合参与食品工业特别是肉类加工的设施。数据还适用于用于处理这些过程产生的废水和排放的各种末端处理技术，例如治疗氨氮、化学需氧量（COD）、有机结合氮、磷、颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）等污染物。这些技术包括化粪池、各种生物处理、化学混凝和物理分离过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1353文件，在完整版文件中第2561页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为干炸肉制品，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic hydrolysis + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (days) / normal production time (days)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧水解类+生物接触氧化法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+好氧生物处理法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + SBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+SBR类，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是静电除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisChemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management40，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (days) / normal production time (days)
